DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate dose-proportionality Dilatrend SR 8mg , 16mg , 32mg , 64mg , 128mg healthy male volunteer .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age range 20 54 year , Body mass index ≥19 ≤26 healthy male volunteer 2 . Able participate procedure 3 . SBP 90140 mmHg , DBP 6090 mmHg , Pulse rate 5595 times/min 4 . Have give write informed consent 1 . Have history significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , pulmonary , hematologic , gastrointestinal , endocrine , musculoskeletal neurologic disease 2 . Have history gastrointestinal disease ( Crohn 's disease , gastrointestinal ulcer ) surgery ( except Appendectomy , Hernia ) 3 . Have allergy hypersensitivity carvedilol component formulation ( aspirin , antibiotic ) 4 . Have history drug abuse . A positive test drug ( amphetamine , barbiturate , cocaine , opiates , benzodiazepine , THC , methadone , ect . ) include urine drug screen . 5 . Have herbal drug within 30days prior first IP administration , ETC within 14days prior first IP administration , OTC 7days prior first IP administration . 6 . Have diet may influence absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug ( ) , ( Drinking 1L grapefruit juice within 7days prior first IP administration ) 7 . Have receive investigational drug within 60 day prior first IP administration 8 . Have donate whole blood within 60 day prior donation plasma within 30 day prior first IP administration 9 . Have metabolic enzyme include inhibit drug like barbiturate within 30 day prior first IP administration . 10 . A heavy caffeine/alcohol consumer heavy smoker ( caffeine > 5 units/days . alcohol > 21 units/week ( 1 unit=pure alcohol 10mL ) , Cigarette > 10 Cigarettes/day ) alcohol abuse . 11 . Positive Hepatitis B , Hepatitis C , HIV syphilis
